translations: n.（尤指北美北部因纽特人用坚厚雪块盖的）圆顶小屋

phrs.translation: 冰屋, 易酷乐, 圆顶建筑, 小冰屋
机动战士高达, 默示录, 年战争秘史·第一卷, 一年战争秘录
冰屋游戏中心, Igloo游戏合集

sentences.sentence: When you sign up, you adopt an animated penguin to chat with friends, play games, explore, collect coins and even personalize your very own igloo.
sentences.translation: 注册时，你就会领养一只活泼的企鹅来与朋友聊天、玩游戏、探索、收集硬币、甚至让你自己的圆顶冰屋个性化。

sentences.sentence: Sometimes he stays in an ice house called igloo.
sentences.translation: 有时他会待在一个叫做 igloo 的冰屋里。

sentences.sentence: In Nunavut's "igloo and email" society, where adults who were born in igloos have children who may never have been out on the land, there's a high incidence of depression.
sentences.translation: 在努纳维特的“冰屋和电子邮件”社会，在冰屋中出生的人们的孩子可能从未到过陆地上，抑郁症发病率很高。
